content: Hi, on the 2020 Nictiz profile https://simplifier.net/nictiz-r4-zib2020/nlcorecontactinformationemailaddresses one use, I see that there is a ConceptMap https://simplifier.net/nictiz-r4-zib2020/nummersoortcodelijst-to-contactinformation-emailaddressesuse. I am wondering why this NummerSoortCodelijst and not EmailSoortCodelijst, and if this is correct? In the mapping is also referred to EmailSoortCodelijst.

Hi @Liset van Wijk nice catch! I think you are right. Also see the current STU3 profile for this concept: https://simplifier.net/nictizstu3-zib2017/emailsoortcodelijst-to-contactpointuse which does use the correct EmailSoortCodelijst reference. I have created a GitHub issue in the Nictiz R4 zib2020 repository to fix this: https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-R4-zib2020/issues/231
